嫁.definition: (of a woman) to marry; to marry off a daughter; to shift (blame etc)

嫁人.definition: (of a woman) to get married; to take a husband

嫁接.definition: to graft (a branch to a rootstock)

嫁禍.definition: to impute; to shift the blame onto someone else

嫁禍於人.definition: to pass the misfortune on to sb else (idiom); to blame others; to pass the buck

嫁裝.definition: variant of 嫁妝|嫁妆[jia4 zhuang5]

嫁雞隨雞.definition: If you marry a chicken, follow the chicken (idiom); A woman should follow whatever her husband orders.; We must learn to accept the people around us.

嫁雞隨雞，嫁狗隨狗.pinyin: jià jī suí jī ， jià gǒu suí gǒu
嫁雞隨雞，嫁狗隨狗.definition: if you marry a chicken follow the chicken, if you marry a dog follow the dog (idiom)
